main event: An unidentified flying object was reported in Sheridan, Indiana on January 9, 1966.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 17 minutes., A husband (66 years old) and his child (13 years old) were confirmed witnesses., The object had a nucleus of reddish color with outer yellow rings and was over a quarter the size of the moon., The UFO moved rapidly, disappearing and reappearing., The Air Force deemed the collected data insufficient for evaluation.
sighted object: an unidentified flying object with a reddish nucleus and yellow outer rings
witness description: a husband aged 66 and his child aged 13
